page.title: 08St.Andrews Church (present)
page.content:
We go to{Beaufort Middle School which is on a new housing estate called Goldsworth Park.On Sundays our school is used as a church.It is called St.Andrews Goldsworth Park and it is a Church of England school.The vicar is the{Reverand Andrew Knowles and he has several readers.
He visits many schools,including ours, as part of his ministry.When he moved to Goldsworth Park there was no church building and he opened a church in our school in{May 1980. It costs about Â£1,200 a year to run the church.
